name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Side Story II
summary: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden II ~Ao wo Uketsugu Mono~ (Genteiban) (機動戦士ガンダム外伝Ⅱ　蒼を受け継ぐ者　（限定版）) is an Action - Shooter game, developed by BEC (Bandai Entertainment Company) / Studio Orphee and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1996 for the Sega Saturn.
